item.title: Crack Slaw
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil 3 cloves garlic, minced 1/2 cup onion, diced 5 green onions, sliced on a bias (white and green parts) 1 pound ground pork 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger sea salt and black pepper, to taste 1 tablespoon Sriracha or garlic chili sauce, more to taste 14 ounce bag coleslaw mix (green cabbage, red cabbage and carrots) 3 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon unseasoned rice vinegar 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds Directions Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
